messages.content:
please use the json data in localStorage about beans to add more information into the modal: if they are not rank #1 then there should be a peice of information that calculates how many beans short you are of having a larger number of beans than the person of the rank before the corresponding json data referenced by name
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

it appears you're not parsing the line correctly. the line to be expected is here: üèÜ Top 10 Bean Holders:1. handyc ü´ò (460 beans)2. loudercake ü´ò (411 beans)3. _cloudbot ü´ò (282 beans)4. valware ü´ò (203 beans)5. mattf ü´ò (145 beans)6. ken ü´ò (92 beans)7. telegram/loudercake ü´ò (69 beans)8. telegram/handych ü´ò (50 beans)9. konrado ü´ò (30 beans)10.
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

it appears you're not parsing the line correctly. here is an example using the expected format: üèÜ Top 10 Bean Holders:1. handyc ü´ò (460 beans)2. loudercake ü´ò (411 beans)3. _cloudbot ü´ò (282 beans)4. valware ü´ò (203 beans)5. mattf ü´ò (145 beans)6. ken ü´ò (92 beans)
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
